text: atanu (musa) annadu: "Ayana (allah) antunnadu: 'A govu bhumini dunnataniki gani, polalaku nillu todataniki gani upayogincabadakunda, arogyanga elanti lopalu lekunda undali.' Ani!" Appudu varannaru: "Ippudu nivu satyam teccavu." Taruvata varu danini bali (jib'h) cesaru, lekapote varu ala cesevarani anipincaledu
